Posts.Content: MommaMaloney wrote: I recently had a stereotactic breast biopsy. It showed atypical ductal hyperplasia. I’m meeting with a breast surgeon at the end of this month. The radiologist recommend I have it removed. Has anyone had surgery to remove microcalcifications in the ducts and if so, did any margins come back as ductal carcinoma? They said what they took out during the biopsy were benign but the more I read the more nervous I get. I am still not out of the woods I guess ðŸ˜« Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia MommaMaloney MelissaDallas
